summary: Over 300+ hours in the making. 6 unique presets. Enjoy!!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00][size=5]Over 300+ hours in the making. 6 unique presets. Enjoy![/size]

[/color][b][u][color=#ffff00]INSTALLATION[/color][/u]

1. Download: [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0308.htm]0.308binary[/url] and place the d3d9.dll file into your Skyrim folder. (Where the SkyrimLauncher is located)

2. Download my enb preset and install one of the versions along with all files in the same location as 0.308 dll. (skyrim main folder)

3a. Go to http:[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]//www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?[/url] and install EnhancedLightsandFX.esp and nothing else.
3b. Go to my Data folder and install the Vividian-Extended Weathers.esp. 

Load Order:
Vividian-Extended Weathers.esp
EnhancedLightsandFX.esp

4. Calibrate your monitor ( http://www.lagom.nl/lcd-test/) and pay special attention to your gamma. Set ingame brightness to the center. If using LED monitor you may want to set the ingame brightness one to two clicks left of center.

5. I have also included Sun and Sky textures which I would recommend installing or it may not look right.

6. If you want denser fog on distant mountains, there is a plugin replacement for the in the "Miscellaneous" folder.

And please, if you liked it, just take one second to [color=#ff0000]ENDORSE[/color] and support my work ! 


Miscellaneous:
1. BRIGHT SNOW - ----I would highly recommend using dark snow and glacier textures.

If you are finding that the snow is too bright, this shader fix worked for me:
A. http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51495/

Also you can install Yuril's Darker Quality Snow here:
B. http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49011/?

[u]_____________________________
[/u]

You will find a Character Closeup DoF folder that contains a high quality DoF as made by kingeric1992 and tweaked by tetrodoxin. It is a beautiful DoF and I suggest trying it. It is also highly configurable in the ingame GUI whereas the default DoF is not. 

[u]CREDITS[/u]

Thanks to all of you for helping!

Mangaclub for Vividian Weathers Extended. Tetrodoxin for the DoF.[/b]
author: evok99
